org.dockbox.hartshorn.discord.annotations

Annotation Type DiscordCommand


  • @Retention(value=RUNTIME)
 @Target(value=METHOD)
public @interface DiscordCommand
    The interface to mark a method as a Discord command holder.

    • Required Element Summary

      Required Elements 
      Modifier and Type Required Element and Description
      java.lang.String channelId
      The ID of the channel where the command should be listened for.
      java.lang.String command
      The command/alias for the command, excluding a prefix.
      java.lang.String minimumRankId
      The ID of the minimum role a user should have in order for them to be able to use the command.

    • Optional Element Summary

      Optional Elements 
      Modifier and Type Optional Element and Description
      DiscordCommand.ListeningLevel listeningLevel
      The listening level, indicating whether commands should be listened for in private chat channels, chat channels (guild), or both.

    • Element Detail

      • command

        public abstract java.lang.String command
        The command/alias for the command, excluding a prefix.
        Returns:
        the command/alias

      • channelId

        public abstract java.lang.String channelId
        The ID of the channel where the command should be listened for. If * is used, all channels a bot/webhook has access to will be listened to.
        Returns:
        the channel ID

      • minimumRankId

        public abstract java.lang.String minimumRankId
        The ID of the minimum role a user should have in order for them to be able to use the command. If * is used, anyone can execute the command no matter their roles.
        Returns:
        the role ID

      • listeningLevel

        public abstract DiscordCommand.ListeningLevel listeningLevel
        The listening level, indicating whether commands should be listened for in private chat channels, chat channels (guild), or both. If channelId() is set that will always be applied after this filter.
        Returns:
        the listening level
        Default:
        org.dockbox.hartshorn.discord.annotations.DiscordCommand.ListeningLevel.BOTH
